A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An OK Star Wars movie\, a couple plot twists were nice\, the rest were too much and obnoxious. Story line is Empire Strikes Back played in reverse or a 2 1/2 hour car chase where no one turns (whichever you prefer). John Williams made yet another fantastic film score. I didn’t hate Porgs until after I saw the movie and it was confirmed that they were only placed in movie to sell toys. Canto Bight could have been a great addition but it was used for a pathetic side quest. It really was a good movie over all\, but made a lot of missteps. If it wasn’t a Star Wars film it wouldn’t have gotten 3 1/2 Stars from me\, but it does still have a standard to uphold and it held it\, but not high.
